title: QUANTUM HYPNOSIS WITH DR. MARCO PARET / NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC INDUCTIONS
description:
Dr. Paret demonstrates strong quantum hypnosis in a forest at night, during on of his non-verbal hypnosis masterclasses. His students experience strong hypnotic states that help them to connect with their deepers selves and to become professional hypnotherapists. In this video, Dr. Paret's students entered in deep hypnotic inductions near a fire that deepened the hypnotic experience. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
